title: The Great primitives. - Vol. 1.
creator_credit: Auguste Lumiere, Louis Lumiere and Jason Films Productions
brief_description: A collection of excerpts from some early pioneer films made between 1895-1912. The films included are; “Lumiere Premiere Program”, made in 1895; “A Trip to the Moon”, made in 1902; “Great Train Robbery”, made in 1903; and, a series of animations done by Cohl between 1908-1912.
